 2. The community service project plan shall be developed by the
community council which shall direct the activities of the community
service project. The community council shall select a lead agency which
shall be responsible for the administration of the community service
project. The community council shall select and approve the funding of
subcontractors pursuant to this title for the purpose of the development
of the community service project plan.
